rows.label: tlk400702_msg0001
rows.name:
First, check the Invidian
Merc Missions. Then accept
the "First Mission."

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0002
rows.name:
If you don't have any spare
Blades, try bonding with some
more and then give it a try.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0004
rows.name:
Now all you can do is wait for the
Blades you dispatched to return.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a simple practice mission,
so they should be back soon.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0006
rows.name: Sorry, I didn't explain it well enough.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0007
rows.name:
When the Merc Mission is over, the
Blades will report back to you.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0008
rows.name:
That's when you'll find out
the results. And of course,
you'll get your reward then.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0009
rows.name:
So, to complete a Merc Mission,
you need to receive the reward.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0010
rows.name: Now, go ahead and try it.
